model_answer: B: It lets you select a specific few seconds, add a title in a Create clip interface, and generates a unique URL that loops on the existing watch page.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on video game terminology for help. In the context of PUBG, 'clip' refers to a section of a broadcast that can be saved and rewatched later. So, when the clip button is pressed, the last fifteen seconds of the current broadcast will be captured.

Therefore, the answer is (A).
